title: Digital Marketing Officer Job at KizzyTelsConcept
content:
KizzyTelsConcept is a dynamic and forward-thinking digital company that was established in 2020 in Port Harcourt, Nigeria. We are passionate about bridging the gap between creativity and technology by delivering high-quality digital content and marketing solutions across various sectors. From our humble beginnings, KizzyTelsConcept has evolved into a budding digital hub that provides unique marketing services for audiobooks, digital learning content, and fashion materials, using innovative digital platforms to reach a broad and diverse audience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Officer
Job Location: Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Responsibilities
Market Analysis and Research:


	Conducts market research to identify trends, customer needs, and competitive positioning.
	Collects and analyses data to support strategic decision-making.


Strategic Planning and Development:


	Helps define target markets and positioning strategies.
	Supports product development and pricing strategies through market feedback.


Team Coordination and Supervision:


	Assigns tasks, provides training, and evaluates team performance.
	Facilitates collaboration between departments (e.g., sales, product, and branding).


Stakeholder Communication and Reporting:


	Communicates findings and marketing strategies to management and other stakeholders.
	Prepare periodic reports, dashboards, and presentations to guide leadership decisions.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND qualification with 3 years of proven experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief Cover Message to: kizzytelsconcept@gmail.com with "Digital Marketing Officer" as the subject of the email.
